words.source: H559 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of אָמַר 'to say'; KJV 'said', ESV 'said', NASB 'said'

H3651 adv. ken 'so, thus'; KJV 'so', ESV 'so', NASB 'so'
H3588 conj. ki 'for, because'; KJV 'for', ESV 'for', NASB 'for'

H4713 proper gentilic name Mitsri 'Egyptian'; KJV 'the Egyptians', ESV 'the Egyptians', NASB 'the Egyptians'
